original: MAP BY BLUE BLUE, WITH THE HELP OF MAPEADORES DISCORD
zh_trans: 地图作者：BLUE BLUE，在MAPEADORES DISCORD的帮助下完成

original: *** WE WILL BE FREE IN 20 SECONDS ! ***
zh_trans: *** 20 秒后我们就自由了！ ***

original: *** WAIT 20 SECONDS FOR THE ICE TO MELT ***
zh_trans: *** 等待 20 秒让冰融化 ***

original: *** THE PATH IS CLEAR ! GO GO GO ! ***
zh_trans: *** 道路畅通! GO GO GO ! ***

original: *** WAIT 15 SECONDS ***
*** SO LONG EH SNOW WAVES ! ***
*** SHOOT THE BOX ! ***
zh_trans: *** 射击那个盒子! ***

original: *** THE GIANT SHELL WILL MOVE IN 15 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 巨大龟壳将在 15 秒后移动 ***

original: *** COLLECT THE 8 RED COINS TO OPEN THE DOOR ***
zh_trans: *** 集齐8个红色硬币以打开那个门 ***

original: *** ELEVATOR WILL MOVE IN 15 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 电梯将在 15 秒后移动 ***

original: *** THE ICE ON THE LADDER WILL MELT IN 20 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 梯子上的冰将在 20 秒后融化 ***

original: *** ZOMBIES TP TO THE PENGUIN IN 15 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 15 秒后僵尸传送到企鹅那 ***

original: *** WE FOUND THE STAR ! ***
zh_trans: *** 我们找到了幸运星 ! ***

original: *** DEFEND THE SNOWMAN'S HEAD FOR 20 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 守住雪人的头 20 秒 ***

original: *** THE GREAT COLD WILL KILL EVERYTHING BELOW ***
zh_trans: *** 极寒会杀死下方的一切 ***

original: *** THE ELEVATOR WILL BE ACCESSIBLE IN 10 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 电梯 10 秒后可用 ***

original: *** THE ELEVATOR WILL MOVE IN 10 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 电梯 10 秒后移动 ***

original: *** THE FLOWER PUSH WILL START IN 20 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 花朵将在 20 秒后生成上升气流 ***

original: *** LET'S FLY ! ***
*** THE ICE WALL WILL BREAK IN 20 SECONDS ! ***
zh_trans: *** 冰墙将在 20 秒后摧毁 ! ***

original: *** LET'S A-GO ! ***
*** DEFEND 25 SECONDS 'TILL THE SNOWMAN MELT ***
zh_trans: *** 防守 25 秒直到雪人融化 ***

original: *** FALL BACK ***
*** DEFEND UNTIL THE CHIMNEY IS REACHABLE ***
zh_trans: *** 守住，直到能碰到烟囱为止 ***

original: *** THE PLATEFORM WILL MOVE IN 20 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 平台将在 20 秒后移动 ***

original: *** THE PLATEFORM WILL MOVE UP IN 20 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 平台将在 20 秒后上升 ***

original: *** SHOOT THIS WALL TO OPEN A PATH !! ***
zh_trans: *** 射击这堵墙来打开一条通路 !! ***

original: *** FALL BACK ! ***
*** DEFEND 15 SECONDS UNTIL THE FLOOR BREAK ***
zh_trans: *** 防守 15 秒直到地板碎裂 ***

original: *** DEFEND 30 SECONDS 'TIL THE BRIDGE COLLAPSE ***
zh_trans: *** 防守 30 秒直到桥塌 ***

original: *** THE DOOR WILL OPEN IN 20 SECONDS ***
*** PENGUIN WILL MOVE IN 15 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 企鹅将在 15 秒后移动 ***

original: *** THE DOORS WILL OPEN IN 20 SECONDS ***
*** HERE WE GO ! ***
zh_trans: *** 我们出发吧 ! ***

original: *** WE FOUND THE SECRET STAR ! ***
zh_trans: *** 我们找到了秘密星星 ! ***

original: *** DEFEND FOR 20 LAST SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 进行最后的 20 秒防御 ***

original: *** DEFEND FOR 30 LAST SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 进行最后的 30 秒防御 ***
